artist: After Nicholas Hilliard; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate in black: [ Vol. 1 p.148/NICHOLAS HILLIARD  T. Chambars sculp/ ætatis fuæ 30. 1577/ from a limning at Penshurst];  on sheet in pencil: [1-537/ This is the only engraved Portrait of the artist/ Bromleys' Catalogue]
life_date: After Nicholas Hilliard, British, 1537–1619; Thomas A. E. Chambars, Engraver, British, 1724–1789
title: Portrait of Nicholas Hilliard
